content: Created a minimal Draft 2020-12 JSON Schema at `schemas/benchmark.schema.json` defining the required structure for a benchmark run (metadata, system info, and per-case results with basic validation rules).

content.text: Created a minimal Draft 2020-12 JSON Schema at `schemas/benchmark.schema.json` defining the required structure for a benchmark run (metadata, system info, and per-case results with basic validation rules).
